sourceMeaningMnemonic: We want you to say things with your <radical>mouth</radical> right <radical>now</radical> because it's <kanji>recital</kanji> time! Go, perform please. What do you mean you didn't know the recital was right now? Well, tough luck. Recite!
meaningInfo: The recital is happening now. So open your mouth and start already!
readingMnemonic: Here, if you are too afraid to start the <kanji>recital</kanji> now drink this <reading>gin</reading> (<ja>ぎん</ja>) to get your courage up. But once you're done drinking it the recital starts!
readingInfo: Drink gin before all your recitals! It'll help!
